Comment: Oh yeah it’s going to be a waste. Let’s assume they are only going to send a single flight, and let’s round down and say it’s only a 13 hour flight one way. Well the C17 which they have been using in deportation flights cost approximately $28,000 per hour to operate. And the round trip would be about 26 hours. Meaning this one way trip alone would cost the American taxpayer $364,000. And it would cost $728,000 for a round trip.  Edit: small math mistake. That’s $364,000 one way. So all together we would be looking at $728,000. Thank you to the user who pointed out the error.
